# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $100 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique benefits, I believe it's an excellent investment for you. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $95. This exclusive deal won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
